name: Two-Game Arcade
description:
Only two cabinets in this arcade work. Really, where's the repair guy?

(choose dialogue options with the up and down arrow keys, and use the right arrow key to confirm your selection!)

Made for the Global Game Jam 2022! I'm incredibly busy with classes, but I wanted to participate, even with just a small game.

Made in bitsy 7.11, with the following hacks:

  • bitsymuse
  • dialog choices
  • dialog pause
  • transparent sprites

Sound effect from Mixkit, music made in BeepBox. Special shoutout to pixsy for existing.
